## 表3

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
table3 <- df %>%
  group_by(PLS) %>%
  summarise("Comprehensibility M" = mean(vst,na.rm = TRUE),
            "Comprehensibility SD" = sd(vst,na.rm = TRUE),
            "Credibility M" = mean(vtr,na.rm = TRUE),
            "Credibility SD" = sd(vtr,na.rm = TRUE),
            "Ability to evaluate M" = mean(wahr,na.rm = TRUE),
            "Ability to evaluate SD" = sd(wahr,na.rm = TRUE),
            "Ability to make a decision M" = mean(ent,na.rm = TRUE),
            "Ability to make a decision SD" = sd(ent,na.rm = TRUE),
            )%>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = "Comprehensibility M":"Ability to make a decision SD",
    names_to = c("Outcome"),
    values_to = "score"
    ) %>%
  spread(
  key = PLS,
  value = score
) %>%
  separate(
  col = Outcome,
  into = c("Outcome", "M_SD"),
  sep = -2
) %>%
  rename(
    "PLS with subheading" = "PLS",
    "PLS without subheading" = "No Heading",
    "ordinary scientific abstract" = "Non PLS"
  )%>%
print()


```
